id: scenario-value-scanner-senior-scenarios-family-protecting margaret's time for self-care and personal life
title: Protecting Margaret's time for self-care and personal life
description: Protecting Margaret's time for self-care and personal life
content:
Scenario: Protecting Margaret's time for self-care and personal life
    Given Margaret's family depends on her care contributions
    And she needs time for her own health and well-being
    When the family_elohim monitors Margaret's time allocation
    Then it should protect her time for personal needs
    And it should flag when family demands encroach on self-care
    And Margaret should be supported in setting boundaries
    And family should understand that her care capacity requires self-care
    And she should be encouraged to maintain her own friendships and interests
    And the system should prevent family from consuming all her time
